description: The file defines a Flutter widget for the main home page of a recipe explorer app, including UI layout, search functionality, and navigation to favorites.

classes.name: HomePage
classes.description: Main entry widget for the home page, provides search and listing of recipes.

classes.name: _HomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the internal logic and UI of HomePage.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes providers, loads recipes and favorites, sets search query.

methods.name: _buildSearchBar
methods.description: Builds the search input field with clear functionality.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the main UI layout including app bar, search bar, and recipe list.
